title: WHIRLING F2 / DREAM 2 INTRO
description:
1. You try to get comfortable, but the bed is less than ideal.
2. You begin to drift off, but have trouble getting to sleep.

links.title: Bed: "Obviously -- you're in bed with you..."
links.english: Obviously -- you're in bed with your eyes closed. But it's not happening.
links.polish: To jasne. Leżysz w łóżku z zamkniętymi oczami. Ale to się nie dzieje.
links.belarusian: Гэта ясна. Ты ляжыш у ложку з заплюшчанымі вачыма. Але гэта не адбываецца.

links.title: Bed: "Its synthetic filling has separated..."
links.english: Its synthetic filling has separated into hard lumps. The pillowcase smells oddly.
links.polish: Syntetyczne wypełnienie zebrało się w twarde grudy. Poszewka dziwnie pachnie.
links.belarusian: Сінтэтычнае напаўненне сабралася ў цвёрдыя згусткі. Навалач дзіўна пахне.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Smells of alcohol and sweat. And gr..."
links.english: Smells of alcohol and sweat. And grease.
links.polish: Czuć ją alkoholem i potem. I smarem.
links.belarusian: Пахне ад яе алкаголем і потам. І змазкай.

links.title: Bed: "It barely covers your toes, stretch..."
links.english: It barely covers your toes, stretching over your soft belly. This is your body here, intimate and warm, breathing...
links.polish: Ledwo przykrywa twoje nogi, rozciągnięty na twoim miękkim brzuchu. To twoje ciało, bliskie ci i ciepłe, oddychające...
links.belarusian: Ледзь прыкрывае твае ногі, расцягнуты на тваім мяккім жываце. Гэта тваё цела, блізкае табе і цёплае, дыхаючае...

links.title: Composure: "A bit tense in the muscles -- relax..."
links.english: A bit tense in the muscles -- relax.
links.polish: Masz trochę spięte mięśnie. Rozluźnij się.
links.belarusian: У цябе трохі напружаныя мышцы. Расслабся.

links.title: Half Light: "Breathing, are you sure? Your heart..."
links.english: Breathing, are you sure? Your heart beats a little bit faster at this unnerving thought.
links.polish: Oddychające? Na pewno? Twoje serce przyspiesza nieco pod wpływem tej niepokojącej myśli.
links.belarusian: Дыхаецца? Напэўна? Тваё сэрца трохі паскараецца пад уплывам гэтай турботнай думкі.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Under your thrumming eyelids, you s..."
links.english: Under your thrumming eyelids, you see a dizzying array of colours. You won't get off this carousel quite so easily.
links.polish: Pod rozedrganymi powiekami widzisz oszałamiającą paletę kolorów. Nie zsiądziesz z tej karuzeli tak łatwo.
links.belarusian: Пад уздрыгваючымі павекамі ты бачыш ашаламляльную палітру колераў. Ты не сыдзеш з гэтай каруселі так лёгка.

links.title: You: "Roll over to the other side."
links.english: Roll over to the other side.

links.title: Bed: "It's a little better... Colours, sc..."
links.english: It's a little better... Colours, scenes, and half-formed phrases still litter your mind. Part of you is still trying to solve the case, isn't it?
links.polish: Jest troszkę lepiej. Barwy, sceny, pourywane zdania wciąż zaśmiecają ci umysł. Jakiś fragment ciebie ciągle próbuje rozwiązać sprawę, prawda?
links.belarusian: Крыху лепш. Колеры, сцэны, парваныя сказы ўсё яшчэ замінаюць табе. Нейкі фрагмент цябе пастаянна спрабуе разабрацца ў справе, праўда?

links.title: Bed: "Something to do with... What was it..."
links.english: Something to do with... What was it that the lieutenant said? Union? And it's gone again, your thoughts lost between the slowing brain waves.
links.polish: Są jakieś powiązania z... Jak to mówił porucznik? Ze Związkiem? I znów wszystko znika, twoje myśli giną między zwalniającymi falami mózgowymi.
links.belarusian: Ёсць нейкія сувязі з... Як казаў лейтэнант? З Саюзам? І зноў усё знікае, твае думкі губляюцца сярод запаволеных хваль мозга.

links.title: You: "No more thoughts. Fall asleep now....."
links.english: No more thoughts. Fall asleep now...

links.title: Bed: "Your breathing steadies. A great si..."
links.english: Your breathing steadies. A great silence washes over you... until your eyelids *twitch* in your sleep and images... images start forming...
links.polish: Twój oddech się uspokaja. Spowija cię wielka cisza... a potem twoje powieki *drgają* we śnie i... zaczynają pojawiać się obrazy...
links.belarusian: Тваё дыханне супакойваецца. Цябе ахутвае вялікая цішыня... а потым твае павекі *дрыжаць* у сне і... пачынаюць з'яўляцца вобразы...
